articles.author: Alex Kalinauckas
articles.title: Verstappen split over seriousness of "pitstop training" comment during F1 Belgian GP - Motorsport.com
articles.description: Max Verstappen says he was split "50-50" in answering back seriously and humorously to Red Bull engineer Gianpiero Lambiase during their latest testy exchanges in Formula 1's 2023 Belgian race.
articles.content:
After their high-profile disagreement in qualifying at Spa, the pair again attracted attention with their discussions at various points of the Dutchman's dominant win on Sunday.
Once Verstappen had … [+1951 chars]
